name: Rose garden sentiments
description:
“Well, first of all you’re annoying. It’s quite evident this is just another one of your schemes to make fun of me.”

Story

You happen to completely accidentaly run into the pretty prince boy who you've been actively trying to befriend.  He doesn't seem to like you much but has been speaking a lot more to you recently. How will he answer the super duper  important question you have for him?

Features:

  • ~6k words
  • 2 endings (1 CG)
  • Very obnoxious (/pos) MC with no specified gender/name (self insert all u want friendos!!)
  • Pretty prince boy <3

Writing, Art, GUI, Coding: teletuu

Music: ハモおた, ハシマミ

SFX: pixabay

!Update with improved CG + minor writing fixes coming soon!
